ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: no flame need, mine was my opinion. To each there own right. hhehehe good points on both of us.
ygData.messageBody:
no flame need, mine was my opinion. To each there own right. hhehehe good
points on both of us.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: schlaban yocksovik [SMTP:anonymaste@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 8:31 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Slam vs. Bash
>
> From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
>
> hmm waste of time learning bash cus you get dual wield?
> I have to dissagree with you big time.
> The sole purpose of a higher level warrior is not being able to dualwield
> and smack the enemy with loads of damage.
> Thats the casters job, warriors are tanks and should have rockin armor and
> a
> shield for protection and to bash with to stunn and interupt casters IMHO.
> Sure dualwield is _realy_ good and thats a skill to keep maxed too, it
> rocks
> on easier mobs, but when the s#&t hits the fan that bash and shield ac
> might
> be the thing saving your teams but.
>
> ps
> I dont want to start a flame war, just my oppinion.
> ds
>
> vashi
> >From: Kyle Buffington <KBuffington@...>
> >
> >Slam is what the larger races get and Bash is what the smaller races get
> >with a shield.
> >If you are a warrior like me then you are wasting your time with bash if
> >you
> >are going to dual wield when you hit level 15.
> >I am not positive if it is a waste of time with a Barbarian.
> >that is my understanding into bash and slam.
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Patricia Halas [SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> > > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 8:11 AM
> > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [warriors_eq] Slam vs. Bash
> > >
> > > From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
> > >
> > > What is the difference between Slam and Bash? I have been bashing
> > > everyone
> > > like crazy trying to get it up to the same level as my kick, and now I
> > > find
> > > out that I might be wasting my time. I am a Barbarian Princess, so
> > > slamming
> > > people around is right in my league, but just what is the difference?
> > >
> > > For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;
> > >
